name: Flipbox
author: Arron Schaar, Daniel Buchner
description: Flips between two content elements with a CSS Animation, similar to flipping a playing card. The front face default to the first direct child element of the <x-flipbox>, and the back face defaults to the last direct child element.

setters.flipDirection: The direction to flip. Valid values are right, left, up, and down.

methods.toggle: Flips the card to its opposite face.

events.*: show: If either the front face or the back face of the flipbox receives a show event, the flipbox will automatically show that side.
